mapper.select: SELECT up.user_id,up.org_id,up.prac_id,up.post_id,opp.post_name,st.name,st.stu_num,st.phonenum,st.email FROM sys_stu_details st LEFT JOIN sys_user_post up ON st.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_org_prac_post opp ON up.org_id = opp.org_id AND up.prac_id = opp.prac_id AND up.post_id = opp.post_id WHERE st.stu_num = #{stuNum}
